Title: Paperhouse
Actors: Charlotte Burke, Jane Bertish, Samantha Cahill, Glenne Headly
Plot: Anna is becoming lost in the loneliness of her own world when she discovers she can visit another, a house she has drawn herself and occupied by a young disabled boy. But as she discovers more of the links between her fantasy world and the mundane present, she is drawn only deeper into a dream turning into a nightmare.
